DOC.brief_summary: Interventional study of modulation of immune response in patients with pancreatic tubular adenocarcinoma after resection and gemcitabine treatment. When included, patients are pre-treated with moderate doses of cyclophosphamide. Then infusions of allogeneic mononuclear cells are given.
DOC.brief_title: Modulation of the Immune Response in Patients With Pancreatic Tubular Adenocarcinoma
DOC.criteria: ECOG performance status 02 at the time of inclusion Following R0 or R1 pancreatic tubular adenocarcinoma resection and adjuvant gemcitabine treatment Pregnancy Less than 3 mths expected survival Serious comorbidity Age above 70 yrs
